simple_means.memory_skill: en- 进入,使… + deavor 义务,债务

tr: earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something
example: made an effort to cover all the reading material
wished him luck in his endeavor
she gave it a good try

tr: a purposeful or industrious undertaking (especially one that requires effort or boldness)
example: he had doubts about the whole enterprise
we endeavor to make our customers happy

partsOfSpeech.dec: en- 进入,使… + -able 可...的
en- 进入,使… + courage n.勇气
en- 进入,使… + erg 能量 + -y 名词后缀
en- 进入,使… + joy 高兴
en- 进入,使… + rich adj.有钱的
en- 进入,使… + erg 能量 + -etic ...的;与...相关的
en- 进入,使… + large adj.大的
en- 进入,使… + view 看
en- 进入,使… + close adj.近的
en- 进入,使… + counter 反对,相反
en- 进入,使… + dur 持续,硬 + -e
en- 进入,使… + force 力量
en- 进入,使… + gage 承诺
en- 进入,使… + sure 肯定
en- 进入,使… + thus- 表示"神" + iasm
en- 进入,使… + title 赋予;头衔,名称
en- 进入,使… + hance 高
en- 进入,使… + tail 剪切
en- 进入,使… + roll 卷,册
en- 进入,使… + light 光亮;点亮 + -en 动词后缀
